snippet: Iran announced Thursday that it planned to boycott this year’s Frankfurt Book Fair in protest over a scheduled speech at the site by the novelist.
abstract: Planned speech by novelist Salman Rushdie at Frankfurt Book Fair provokes Iranian boycott of event; author's book The Satanic Verses has been banned in Iran since 1988 as many Muslims consider it blasphemous.
lead_paragraph: Iran announced Thursday that it planned to boycott this year’s Frankfurt Book Fair in protest over a scheduled speech at the site by the novelist.

headline.main: Iran: Shunning an Event With Salman Rushdie
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Shunning an Event With Rushdie
